channel.title: Npc Dicer
channel.description: Does anyone know a tutorial on making it so you offer an amount of coins to an npc. Then they display a number above there head between 0-100. and if its greater than 55 it doubles there bet, but if less than 55 it keeps ther ecoins.. like a 55x2 npc?
